customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and functional.
customer_reviews.text: This is great! I never knew how many particulates were in my red wine. You'll be surprised. I will recommend that you buy a glass ball or some kind of topper to keep air/dust out. I am making a storage cover for it from my 3D printer, to keep dust out while it is shelved. It is also beautifully elegent.
customer_reviews.author: Revelation

customer_reviews.title: I needed a strainer and wanted a decanter

I am not sure I am an aerating convert yet, but so far so good. I would have given this 5 stars, but there is a bubble in the glass that I am a bit concerned about. It's a nice little set, there are no leaks, no holes, but... That bubble is in there...
customer_reviews.author: Paul C

customer_reviews.title: I love it so far
customer_reviews.text: I've never decanted wine in an actual decanter and so I was skeptical, but it truly made a difference. This was not an expensive bottle of wine that I tried it with, but one we have had before. I poured some into a glass and quickly covered with plastic wrap. Then I poured the rest of the bottle into the decanter. Waited about 20 to 30 minutes and compared the glass with the decanted wine and it was really noticeable. The BITE was completely removed. I love it so far.

customer_reviews.title: Decanter OK, metal parts not so much
customer_reviews.text: I like the decanter. The wine shower is OK. The holes at the bottom of the Shower Funnel tube are not flush with the end of the tube, so a small amount of wine ends up there. Beware of accidental spills. It is also hard to clean down to the end of this tube (where wine may have dried if not rinsed immediately after use). The Sediment Strainer looked good out of the package but with one use, part of the bowl-shaped screen slipped out of the metal ring holding it, exposing the cut edges of a third of the screen No easy way to repair it that I can see.
customer_reviews.author: Wndsrfr

customer_reviews.title: This has allowed us to salvage many old wines.
customer_reviews.text: We've had a number of 20 - 30 year old wines recently in order to clear out our wine cellar before the wines go bad. The problem was the corks were already going bad and were breaking up when we opened the bottle. This decanter along with the sediment screener has saved us a lot of wine that would have been loaded with many tiny pieces of cork.

customer_reviews.title: Very fragile but funtional

customer_reviews.title: good for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is overall a great basic decantor for the price: good size for aerating, great feel and non messy pour, and I like that it comes with a fitted funnel and strainer. This is a very functional every day use type decater if you don't feel like dropping 500 bucks for a Reidel (otherwise spend the money and use kidd gloves because nothing beats a true reidel decantor)! If, like me you have drunk friends that break things, buy this.

The stein is heavy and stable and the neck of the decanter doesnt reach all the way to the bottom while the mouth of the stein holds the base of the decanter. product_meta.title: Houdini Wine Decanter with Wine Shower Funnel and Sediment Strainer, Off-White, 10-Inch - ,Glass/Stainless
product_meta.description: This Houdini Wine Decanter with Wine Shower Funnel and Sediment Strainer is the perfect accessory for beverages with friends at dinner, on the patio, or in the living room. Improve the flavor and bouquet of wine before serving with this lead crystal decanter with funnel and strainer. Improve the flavor of even more inexpensive wines to serve friends and family. Create a shower of wine by pouring into the decanter over the funnel and strainer, adding oxygen to the wine to enhance its taste and aroma. Remove sediments that develop in aging wine with the stainless steel strainer. All pieces separate from each other for hand cleaning.
